channel.title: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
channel.description:
[quote="no-reply@squarespace.com"] Name: Esther Choy
Email Address: estherchoy5@gmail.com
Subject: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
Message: Hi,
My client would like to make some modifications to the template Aviator on squarespace. They would like to change the color of the logo to color PMS 7626 when its on hover and when its clicked it will go to Design for Life page. They would also like to use icons as tabs on the navigation and change the icons to text when its clicked. And more hover over effects on the project page and other minor modifications. Could you provide an estimate on how many hours it will take? Thanks!
Here is the link to the web site I set up: https://esther-choy-0fnz.squarespace.com/cover/
Regards, Esther
(Sent via cregox <http://www.cregox.com> ) [/quote]

item.title: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

No, you are awesome!!

About the cost, I meant U$175 already considering I might take 3h. U$91 is my minimum rate for the 1st hour and then U$42 per extra hour. I shall reach the price you wanted to pay soon, but not yet!

You did give me a great idea there, though. I first thought of applying a sliding scale (huckabees), but realized it's way too complicated. So I'll try to make some crowdfunding for shares (age of stupid) for one of my projects.

Read full topic
item.source: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace

item.title: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
item.dc:creator: @estherchoy5 esther
item.description:
@estherchoy5 wrote:

You are awesome!! and you should be paid for your advise. I will talk to my client and lets make it 3 hours just in case. 3 x$175 = $525. Maybe more maybe less.. maybe I will learn something from you! I will let you know once I confirm with my client.

Read full topic
item.source: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace

item.title: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Nope. I will only be sure after it's done.

I bet it is simple enough, though. I'm taking a risk here and if I take too long to resolve it, it will be my time "wasted" in gaining less for I promised you a maximum cost.

It's a very low risk for both of us. Also, I already did gave you the technical path I would follow. If you're savvy enough, you may be able to do it yourself, after some hours. Or ask a friend.

If you do, and if it helps you resolving it, I only ask for any small contribution: www.cregox.com/pay

Read full topic
item.source: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace

item.description:
@estherchoy5 wrote:

We will provide the icons but are you sure its that simple?

Read full topic

item.title: Modification of the template Aviator on squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Please read this:

www.cregox.com/your-home

Here, I'm trying a new ticketing system and you're currently required to join and login before we can proceed. After joining you can keep the conversation only through email if you wish and we can keep this in private (although it's most useful if we can put it in the public support category).

This will probably take me around 1 hour, which means it will cost less than U$ 175.

It might be a simple matter of using CSS code known as hover:

stackoverflow.com

Changing image on hover with css/html

asked by user2704743 on 02:08PM - 15 Sep 13
html, css, image, hover

Finally, be warned this and all of our further conversations are in the public support space!

Cheers.

Read full topic
